column4: Can someone help me set my default video player to VLC instead of Totem? I changed it under System->Preferences->Preferred Applications to 'custom' and 'vlc' but it still opens up totem :(
right-click on vlc and click properties and copy that command line to your pref apps command line
I tried and it still launches Totem
try going into the properties of the actual video file and change it to VLC under the "open with" tab... that's the only other thing i can think of
that did it. PITA though, because I'll have to do that for every video filetype.
